Title: Stalker Mastery
Description:
Tigers! No matter what land I go to I hear about these big fanged beasts. And yet I haven't had a chance to hunt any of them.

Let's go hunt some tigers. I'll go east, you go west. I think I saw some near Dustback Gorge. I'm sure there are tons near those mushan.
RewardText: Wow! You really racked up a count. I'll chat with Mr. Pleeb about getting the best one converted to a trophy for you.
